short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple time tracking extension for freelancers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How it works:
1. Create a project
2. Create a task
3. To log your time simply start/stop the timer, and optionally add a description
4. Export your time log and open it your favorite spreadsheet program

We don't store any of your data it is all local on your own computer, and the ability to backup and restore your data is also available in the extension.

We hope you find ChronoTracker useful!
